name: jerry's mytholog
abilities: Codependency is a bitch. Can join Beth's Mytholog in combat without the use of a wandering monster card. Together, they get an extra +5.
bad: Pathetic! -5 in your next combat.

name: frank palicky
abilities: +2 against High Schoolers. If there are ice cubes in the play area, he is automatically defeated.
bad: You know I'm gonna cut you, 'cause my family's rich! Discard 300 Gold Pieces worth of items. If you don't have at least 300, turn in what you have.

name: ghost in a jar
abilities: Your memory betrays you. Without searching the discards, recall the name of the bottommost monster in the Door discards. If you cannot, Ghost in a Jar gets +3.
bad: Suffer the Bad Stuff of the bottommost monster in the Door discaards

name: centaur
abilities: Automatically defeated if Scary Terry is your Ally.
bad: Hangups in the Pleasure Chamber are punishable by death! You are dead.

name: photography raptor
abilities: +2 for each Parasite that adds to his level.
bad: Flash! Blindly discard one card from your hand.

name: tuberculosis
abilities: Guns do not count against it.
bad: Discard any Guns you have in play.

name: amish cyborg
abilities: -1 against anyone with a beard. +2 for each electronic device on the table.
bad: Give a card of your choice to another player.

name: uncle steve
abilities: +3 if you have a trip planned within the next two weeks.
bad: Discard a One-Shot item. If you cannot, lose a level.

name: mrs. refrigerator
abilities: The jig is up! When she enters combat, reveal your hand and discard any Traps you are holding.
bad: Suffer the effects of the topmost Trap in the Door discards.

name: hamurai
abilities: Rick, you love those barbeques, Rick.
bad: Meat your maker. You are dead meat.

name: gromflomites
abilities: Damn bureaucrats. +5 if you've ever had a government related job. -2 if Birdperson is your Ally.
bad: Cavity search! Discard a random card from your hand.

name: brad
abilities: +2 against High Schoolers. +3 if there is anything football related in the room. -3 if you have a college degree.
bad: Lose any female Allies and any female players may steal a random card from your hand.

name: cousin nicky
abilities: Without searching the dicards, recall the bottommost Trap in the Door discards. If you cannot, Cousin Nicky gets +3.
bad: Suffer the effects of the bottommost Trap in the Door discards.

name: tinkles
abilities: +3 against Summer.
bad: Prove you're real. Reveal your hand to other players.

name: lucy
abilities: +3 if anyone is wearing a necklace.
bad: Forced to re-enact the car scene. Lose two levels or succumb to deth. Your decision.

name: general nathan
abilities: -2 if you have the Particle Beam Wristwatch equipped.
bad: What America's got is seventy thousand megatons of kaboomboom. Discard three cards.

name: zigerions
abilities: Bare skin! -3 if you are wearing shorts.
bad: The galaxy's most ambitious and least successful con artists. Roll the die. On a 1 or 2, give an item you have in play to the player on your right.

name: poncho
abilities: +2 for each Gun in play. When he enters combat, reveal your hand: -2 if you have Tuberculosis (the card).
bad: You catch a disease and die. You are dead.

name: evil smith clones
abilities: From an alternate dimension's future. The player to your left gets -5 in their next combat if the Clones are defeated.
bad: Demonic alien spirits are really valuable. Discard 500 Gold Pieces worth of items.

name: frakenstein
abilities: You're on the wrong side of the pitchfork. Pick one player to roll the die and add the result to Frankenstein's Level.
bad: Give a Hand item to a player of your choice.

name: king flippy nips
abilities: Gets a bonus equal to Jerry's Level when he enters combat. He gets nothing if Jerry is not in the game.
bad: The price of power. Discard 500 Gold Pieces worth of items

name: pencilvester
abilities: +3 against Rick.
bad: Discard 2 cards.

name: mr. beauregard
abilities: +2 against anyone wearing black or white.
bad: He decides not to quit. Add him to your next combat as another monster, then follow the Parasite rules.

name: snowball
abilities: +4 if there is a living dog in the room. +3 against anyone wearing Headgear. Won't fight Morty, instead gives him the Treasures but no level.
bad: You cannot refer to players by their real names. If you do, lose your Headgear. This only happens once. If you don't have Headgear, lose a level.

name: prince nebulon
abilities: -2 against Super Geniuses. +2 against anyone wearing long sleeves or pants. +5 if you're wearing both.
bad: Lose your Class(es). If you have none, lose a level.

name: shleemypants
abilities: Takes you back in time to when you had less stuff.  When he enters combat, discard two items you have equipped. If you don't have at least two, nothing happens.
bad: "Your assin' ass done mussed up!" Lose a level for messing with time.

name: male gazorpian
abilities: -2 against females. Bonuses from Armor don't help you.
bad: Hostile takeover! Until you go up a level, other players may use your level as a bonus to aid their side in combat. Keep this card in front of you as a reminder.

name: hepatitis a
abilities: Automatically defeated if Hepatitis C is anywhere in play.
bad: Discard an Ally. If you cannot, lose a level.

name: abradolf lincler
abilities: When he enters combat roll the die. On a 5 or higher his less genocidal side takes over and he will not fight you. Collect the treasure, but not the level.
bad: He emancipates you from life. Lose your Class(es).

name: mr. needful
abilities: +6 against anyone level 6 or higher.
bad: Your items are cursed! Roll the die once for each item you have in play. Lose a level each time you roll a 1.

name: sleepy gary
abilities: +3 against Jerry or Beth. Beth cannot help in combat.
bad: He confuses you about your sexuality. -5 in your next combat due to distraction.

name: krombopulos michael
abilities: "Oh boy, here I go killing again."
bad: Assassinated. You are dead.

name: beta seven
abilities: You are classified as a hostile entity. If unity is in play, discard it. +3 if there are more than three players in the game.
bad: Lose your beneficial alliances. Lose a level and all players discard an Ally.

name: fart
abilities: Automatically defeated if you have the Antimatter Gun equipped.
bad: Annihilated. You lose two levels, all other players lose one.

name: king jellybean
abilities: +5 against characters level 5 and below. Automatically defeated if you have the Laser Gun equipped.
bad: Psychologically traumatized. Pay for couseling with 500 Gold Pieces worth of items. You also have -5 in your next combat.

name: tammy guterman
abilities: +3 against Parents. If Birdperson is in play when she enters combat, discard him.
bad: Pumps you and your friends full of steaming loads of lasers. All players discard an Ally.

name: zeep xanflorp
abilities: +3 against Super Geniuses. Armor gives no bonus against him.
bad: You are trapped in the Teenyverse. Lose a level and you cannot Look for Trouble on your next turn.

name: cromulons
abilities: "Show us what you got!" _5 against Songwriters.
bad: Disqualified! You are dead.

name: blim blam the korblock
abilities: You must pick a player to help you in combat; they cannot refuse. If you kill Blim Blam, you split the Treasure equally.
bad: "You two are the F@&$in' worst!" Lose a Hand Item. Also, if you both fail to run away, you are both dead.

name: council of ricks
abilities: +3 against anyone with a Class. Will not pursue anyone Level 5 or below.
bad: That's rickdiculous. Discard an Ally and a Class. Lose a level for each category you cannot discard.

name: ma-sha
abilities: +3 against males. -3 against females. Will not pursue anyone level 5 or below.
bad: "I'm here if you need to talk." You must aid the player on your left in their next combat if they ask for it. Also, lose a level.

name: beth's mytholog
abilities: +3 if you are married. When she enters combat, she gets a combat bonus equal to Jerry's level.
bad: Lose a level. Suffer the effects of the topmost Trap in the Door discards.

name: evil rick
abilities: When he enters combat, lose an Ally you have in play. Will not pursue anyone Level 5 or below.
bad: Lose a level. The next player in combat can force you to help them for no Treasure.

name: evil morty
abilities: When he enters combat you cannot laugh until you defeat him or run away. If you laugh, you automatically suffer the Bad Stuff. Will not pursue anyone Level 5 or below.
bad: Lose any Headgear and a level.

name: galactic federation
abilities: No one can help you in combat. It gets an additional bonus equal to the bonus of any Allies you have in play. Will not pursue anyone Level 5 or below.
bad: Lose two levels. Everyone else loses one level. Discard any Guns you have in play.

name: lizard
abilities: When he enters combat, if the top card of the door discards is a monster, he gets +3 and its combat abilities.
bad: His genetic experiments cause you to change gender, and you have -5 in your next combat.

name: a.i.m. soldier
abilities: +5 against anyone with at least 1,000 gold pieces worth of items in play.
bad: He steals your tech. Discard at least 500 gold pieces worth of items.

name: hydra soldier
abilities: When he enters combat, he gets +2 for each Ally in the top five cards of the treasure discards.
bad: "Hail HYDRA!" Lose a level.

name: vulture
abilities: +4 against Spider-friends
bad: He flies off with your stuff. Discard two cards.

name: scorpion
abilities: May join any combat without a wandering monster card. +2 against Spider-Friends.
bad: Toxic Sting! Discard a card from your hand at random.

name: absorbing man
abilities: If the surface you are playing on is GLASS: +1, WOOD: +2, PLASTIC: +4, METAL: +8, OTHER: +10.
bad: He crushes your stuff. Lose an equipped item.

name: sandman
abilities: Players in combat with him do not get ANY bonuses from hand items. -2 to run away.
bad: Lose all Equipped hand items as they slip through your fingers.

name: shocker
abilities: +3 against anyone wearing armor.
bad: Shocked and stunned. -5 in your next combat.

name: bullseye
abilities: He never misses. Combat bonuses count double for him. He's that good.
bad: Lose your armor. If you aren't wearing any, lose two levels.

name: the leader
abilities: He is way smarter than you could ever hope to be. You cannot use any powers while in combat with him.
bad: Lose all your powers, fool.

name: kraven the hunter
abilities: +2 against anyone with no hand items equipped.
bad: The ultimate hunter... And you are his prey. You are dead.

name: arnim zola
abilities: +2 for each affiliation of the player(s) in combat.
bad: Lose your affiliation(s).

name: crossbones
abilities: If captain america is in play when he enters combat, he gets +5. Then, Captain America must be discarded.
bad: Roll the bones (die) and lose half that many levels, rounded up.

name: rhino
abilities: +6 if he enters combat via a wandering monster card.
bad: Lose your armor.

name: electro
abilities: +2 for each electronic device on the table when he enters combat.
bad: Skip your next (full) turn.

name: hobgoblin
abilities: +3 against Spider-friends.
bad: The next time you attempt to run away, you automatically fail.

name: super-adaptoid
abilities: -3 against Avengers. +1 for every Ally and power in play.
bad: Lose an Ally or a power, your choice. If you have neither, lose a level.

name: klaw
abilities: -3 against black panther. +3 if there is music playing in the room. +6 if vibranium is in play, when he enters combat.
bad: Deafened by his sonic attacks, you cannot respond to requests for help until you go up a level.

name: the unspoken
abilities: +3 against Inhumans. +2 against anyone with no Hand Items equipped.
bad: Lose your affiliation. If you have none, lose a level.

name: doctor octopus
abilities: +2 for each Hand Item and Footgear the player(s) in combat have equipped.
bad: He grabs your stuff and makes off with it. Lose all equipped Hand Items and Footgear.

name: taskmaster
abilities: He gets +2 for each power you have.
bad: Lose a power and a level.

name: madame hydra
abilities: +4 against males. Allies grant no benefits to the players' side.
bad: Roll the die and lose half that many levels, rounded up.

name: mysterio
abilities: When he enters combat, the player(s) he is fighting suffers the effects of the top two traps in the door discards.
bad: Roll the die and discard that many cards.

name: winter soldier
abilities: No one can help you in combat. You must fight him alone. You may not discard an Ally for automatic escape.
bad: Skip your next (full) turn.

name: yellowjacket
abilities: +3 against Avengers. +4 against players level 6 or higher. -4 against players level 5 or below.
bad: Lose an Ally or Item giving you the biggest bonus.

name: maximus
abilities: +5 against Inhumans. -3 against anyone with two or more powers.
bad: Lose a power and levels equal to its rank.

name: mandarin
abilities: When he enters combat, he gets +1 for each ring all players (not only those in combat) are wearing on their fingers. -4 against Iron Man.
bad: Lose all non-one-shot items you have equipped.

name: venom
abilities: -3 against Spider-friends. You may discard Klaw's Sonic Blaster to automatically defeat him (gain treasures, but no levels).
bad: If you are wearing armor, you have -5 in your next combat. If not, -10!

name: baron von strucker
abilities: +3 against anyone with no affiliation. -2 against Avengers
bad: Lose at least 1,000 gold pieces worth of items.

name: carnage
abilities: +4 against Spider-friends. -2 against Avengers. May join Venom in combat without the use of a Wandering Monster card.
bad: You are dead and you lose a level.

name: green goblin
abilities: +3 against Spider-friends. Traps played while he is in combat give him a +3 bonus (in addition to their normal effects).
bad: Lose your Headgear and Armor.

name: kingpin
abilities: +5 against the highest level player. If you are the lowest level player and in combat alone, he won't fight you. Instead you get a treasure.
bad: Your level becomes equal to the lowest level player.

name: m.o.d.o.k.
abilities: If the Cosmic Cube is in play when he enters combat, he gets +10.
bad: It's right there in his name. You are dead.

name: norman osborn
abilities: Monsters of level 4 or below may join him in combat without the use of a wandering monster card.
bad: Lose an Ally and an affiliation.

name: abomination
abilities: -4 against hulk. Players in combat with him do not get any combat bonuses from items with a bonus of +3 or less.
bad: Lose two levels and discard two cards from your hand.

name: baron zemo
abilities: Draw and discard the top two cards of the door deck when he enteres combat. He gets +5 for each monster card revealed this way.
bad: Lose your footgear, and the next time you attempt to run away, you automatically fail.

name: malekith
abilities: -4 against anyone wearing armor. +2 for each one-shot item the player(s) in combat have in play when he enters combat.
bad: Lose an Ally and discard three cards.

name: kang
abilities: Master time-traveler. He knows all your plans. Players may not use one-shots to aid their side in combat.
bad: Go back in time and suffer the bad stuff of the top two monsters in the door discards.

name: red skull
abilities: -4 against Captain America. When he enters combat, lose an Ally, and he gets its bonus. Will not pursue anyone level 4 or below.
bad: Lose your Headgear. If you aren't wearing any, you are dead.

name: ultron
abilities: +5 against Avengers. +3 against anyone wearing armor. -4 against the vision. Will not pursue anyone level 4 or below.
bad: Lose all Allies, Items, and Powers granting you a bonus of +3 or more.

name: loki
abilities: When he enters combat, roll the die. Each player in combat loses half that many in-play Items, rounded up. Will not pursue anyone level 5 or below.
bad: Discard all the cards in your hand, and lose a level for each card discarded this way.

name: jackdaws
abilities: +3 against anyone with 'Woggle-Bug' or 'Jack Pumpkinhead'; +6 if you have both!
bad: Turn all your in-play Items over, shuffle them, and discard one at random. Replace the others as they were.

name: flutterbudgets
abilities: If you have any Curses in your hand, play them on yourself when the Flutterbudgets enter combat.
bad: You automatically fail your next Run Away roll, even if it would otherwise be automatic.

name: rigmaroles
abilities: They don't stop talking! You cannot ask for help in this combat.
bad: Lose your Headgear so you can put your hands over your ears.

name: scoodlers
abilities: +4 against Royalty
bad: They knock you right out of your socks. Lose your Footgear.

name: oztrich
abilities: -1 to Run Away.
bad: Wickid kick! Lose your armor; if you have no Armor, lose a level AND two cards.

name: hammer-heads
abilities: +4 against Wizards.
bad: Body blow! Lose a level unless you have armor.

name: nome
abilities: May join 'General Guph' or 'The Nome King' without using a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Discard an Item.

name: royal gardener of the rose kingdom
abilities: +4 against Soldiers
bad: Savage thorn wounds! Lose a Hand item; if you do not have one, lose a level.

name: wolves
abilities: May join the 'Wicked Witch of the West' without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: They dine well... on you. You are dead.

name: king kleaver of utensia
abilities: +3 against Royalty. Usurpers!
bad: CHOP! Lose one Hand. The effect can be lifted with a 'Wishing Pill' or when you die.

name: invisible bears
abilities: When the Invisible Bears join the combat, the main player may not play any more cards or use Class abilities. His helper, if any, is unaffected.
bad: Lose your Armor. If you don't have Armor, lose two levels.

name: blinkie
abilities: May join 'King Krewl' in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Evil eye! Lose a level or three cards, your choice.

name: winged monkeys
abilities: +3 against Soldiers.
bad: If another player has the 'Golden Cap', give that player two cards. Otherwise, discard two cards.

name: whimsies
abilities: +3 against Proffessors and Wizards. +6 against both!
bad: Lose your Headgear. If you don't have any, lose a level.

name: gwig
abilities: Ouch! +4 if your have no Armor.
bad: Lose an Item worth at least 400 Gold Pieces. If you don't have such an Item, lose any two items.

name: wheelers
abilities: -1 to Run Away
bad: They run you down! Lose your Footgear and a level.

name: wicked witch of the east
abilities: +5 against a munchkin with no Ally. (If two munchkins are fighting and neither has an Ally, +10.)
bad: Lose your Footgear. If you don't have any Footgear, lose an Ally instead.

name: horners
abilities: +3 against munchkins without Armor.
bad: Impaled! Lose two levels.

name: hoppers
abilities: +3 against munchkins with Footgear out of sheer envy.
bad: -1 to your next Run Away roll for every point you failed this roll by.

name: gurgles
abilities: No permanent Items count in this combat; use your level and one-shots only!
bad: Discard the Item currently giving you the largest combat bonus. In case of a tie, choose one.

name: fighting trees
abilities: +2 for each unused Hand the munchkin(s) fighting them have.
bad: Discard all "usable once only" Items in play

name: general guph
abilities: May join 'The Nome King' in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Discard your Class(es). If you have no Class (heh, heh), lose a level.

name: mombi
abilities: -5 against anyone who has changed sex this game.
bad: She changes your sex. -5 on your next combat due to distraction. The penalty can be lifted with a 'Wishing Pill' but the change is permanent.

name: li-mon-eag
abilities: +4 against Super Munchkins.
bad: You are dead.

name: tititi-hoochoo, the great jinjin
abilities: -3 against Royalty
bad: Banished! You must step away from the table until the start of your next turn. You may not play or receive any cards or take part in any table talk.

name: iron giant
abilities: -3 against anyone without Big items.
bad: Lose all your Big items. If you have no Big items, lose two levels.

name: the yoop
abilities: The Yoop is a cannibal. As soon as it enters combat, it eats one of your Allies.
bad: Lose a level. Lose an extra level if you don't have Armor or Headgear.

name: phanfasms
abilities: -3 against Soldiers.
bad: Lose a level and your Armor.

name: kalidah
abilities: -3 against Wizards or Professors. -6 against both!
bad: Lose three levels.

name: general jinjur
abilities: -4 against Wizards, Royalty, or anyone with 'Ozma' as an Ally. (Do not apply the penalty more than once.)
bad: Expelled from the Emerald City! Lose your Class AND discard at least 800 Gold Pieces of Items.

name: king krewl of jinxland
abilities: -4 against Soldiers.
bad: You are jinxed! You cannot accept help in combat until you kill a monster single-handedly.

name: quox
abilities: -4 against Professors. Will not pursue munchkins of Level 2 or below.
bad: Lose all your Hand items.

name: wicked witch of the west
abilities: -5 if you have 'Dorothy' as an Ally. The 'Water Bucket' kills her instantly! Will not pursue anyone Level 3 or below.
bad: You are dead... and your little dog too! If any player has 'Toto' in play, discard it.

name: the nome king
abilities: Will not pursue munchkins of Level 4 or below.
bad: He turns you into a trinket for his collection... wich is just the same as being dead.

name: janibot
abilities: Gadgeteers kill it automatically.
bad: You are swept, dried, dusted, and run through the wringer. Lose a level.

name: fuzzball
abilities: Hairball! +2 against Felines!
bad: Your air filters are clogged. Lose your Headgear.

name: chair
abilities: It might have treasure. Knock the stuffing out of it. Look behind the cushions!
bad: Psychics become one with the chair, and escape automatically. Others must discard one card (your choice).

name: eep
abilities: Stronger than it looks! The person to your left rolls one die and adds the result to Eep's combat strength.
bad: It steals one Item you have in play. The person to your left chooses. Discard it.

name: tiny but advanced creatures
abilities: If you don't want to fight them, you can give them any Item, and they'll go away.
bad: They irradiate your pedal extremities. Lose your Footgear.

name: carnivorous plant
abilities: +3 against Cyborgs... it likes the flavor.
bad: Gross vegetable hickeys. Lose a level.

name: astro-muskrat space pirate
abilities: Will allow a Bounty Hunter to pass if the player does not wish to fight.
bad: Avast! He plunders you. The player to your right draws two cards from your hand and discards them.

name: computer virus
abilities: +4 against Gadgeteers or Bounty Hunters. Yes, these add.
bad: Discard all Complex items you have in play.

name: face hugger
abilities: -4 against Mutants (it can't find the face).
bad: Hold your breath, turn blue, lose two levels.

name: blob
abilities: +1 to Run Away
bad: Swallows you and dissolves your Armor. Lose your Armor.

name: bottle bottle
abilities: Bottle Bottle must die! The player who kills him draws one face-down Door card.
bad: He follows you around, whining. You must give him an Item to make him go away. If you have no items, lose a level.

name: little green man
abilities: Has no females on his planet. +5 against females.
bad: Lose two levels.

name: gas giant
abilities: In combat against a Trader or Traders, the Gas Giant snatches one Item in play from each one before combat starts. The player to the Trader's right determines what is stolen.
bad: Catastrophic flatulence! Lose two levels!

name: space cowboy
abilities: Some people call him the Space Cowboy. Some people just kill him. Get an extra +2 to your attack for each card you discard.
bad: Ties you up with his Electro-Lasso. You may not help anyone until after your next turn.

name: giant ants
abilities: The group mind overwhelms Psychics. +5 against Psychics.
bad: The group mind erases your memory of your Class. Lose your Class(es).

name: space goats
abilities: They eat two cards from your hand before combat. Pick two cards and discard them.
bad: They eat two Items you have in play, starting with your Armor if you have any.

name: fanged fuzzball
abilities: Hairball! +2 against Felines!
bad: It bites your hand off! In a manner of speaking, that is. Discard your whole hand.

name: bug-eyed monster
abilities: Jealous of Mutants because they're prettier. +5 against Mutants.
bad: Cyborgs escape automatically. Others lose two levels.

name: creature from the pink lagoon
abilities: It likes kitties. Nobody knows why. Felines may choose not to fight the Creature. If they don't fight, they draw a card from each deck, face down.
bad: Lose three levels.

name: thing man was not meant to know
abilities: +5 against males. It doesn't mind knowing female characters; they do not have to fight it, and gain a level if they don't fight.
bad: You must lose either a Race or a Class. If you have no Race or Class to lose, you go back to Level 1.

name: awful green thing
abilities: +3 against Psychics. -1 to flee.
bad: It head-butts you! Wham! Lose two levels and discard two cards from your hand.

name: starfish
abilities: Fish yummy! -5 against Felines, and Felines go up an extra level if they kill it or help kill it.
bad: A puddle of water shorts out your shoes. Lose your Footgear.

name: space amazon
abilities: She has a catty attitude. +4 against female characters, or +6 against female Felines.
bad: You must give her Items worth at least 2,000 Gold Pieces, or she pulls your hair out. Lose three levels.

name: slaughterbot
abilities: There's good salvage in a Slaughterbot if you know what to look for. If a Gadgeteer defeats (or helps defeat) this monster, it's worth one extra treasure.
bad: Roll a die and lose that many levels.

name: grays
abilities: They will flee before a Cyborg, leaving their treasure. Nobody gets the kill.
bad: They ask for your advice on cattle mutilation. Lose two levels... which drain off to the players on either side of you, one each.

name: psi psheriff
abilities: -5 against Psychics. Or a Psychic may choose not to fight at all and get a free face-down Door card instead.
bad: He reads your mind and marks out the parts he doesn't like. Lose your Class(es).

name: worminator
abilities: -4 against Mutants
bad: A Trader can buy his way off by discarding any card. Anyone else loses two levels.

name: captain quirk
abilities: Any female who removes Captain Quirk from the galaxy, or helps the one who does, gets an extra level.
bad: He tries to open hailing frequencies and come in peace. Lose one level if you are wearing any Armor. Otherwise, lose three levels. Yes, men, too.

name: being of impure thought
abilities: +5 against anyone who has changed sex at any time during the game.
bad: Lose three levels. In addition, a Trader caught by the Being may not use his Trading ability until his next turn ends.

name: space vampire
abilities: Any other player may discard cards to help the Space Vampire. It gets +2 for every such card discarded.
bad: Lose as many levels as you lost the combat by... maximum of 5.

name: bionic bimbo
abilities: If you give her any item of Footgear, you may draw three Treasures and go in peace. You may choose to fight anyway, of course.
bad: Lose all Footgear you have in play. Discard two cards of your choice AND lose two levels.

name: brain in a jar
abilities: Will not pursue anyone of Level 3 or below. For others, escape is impossible! If you don't kill the Brain in a Jar, it follows you with its thoughts and GETS you.
bad: You forget everything you know. Lose two levels AND your Class(es).

name: space probe
abilities: Will not pursue anyone level 3 or below. Characters of higher Levels lose two levels if they fail to defeat it, even if they escape.
bad: You get probed. Lose any Armor and/or Headgear you are wearing. Lose two levels. Lose your dignity.

name: frank the tank
abilities: +5 against Gadgeteers. Frank wants their toys.
bad: Lose all Items you have in play. But as compensation, if you are below level 3, Frank will raise you to Level 3 so you'll be more fun next time.

name: plasmoid
abilities: Wanted in 18 sectors. +1 Treasure to each Bounty Hunter who defeats it. Fire and flame weapons do not affect the Plasmoid.
bad: It burns you to a tiny, dry, black, ashy, flaky, dead crisp. Then it steps on you. Then it laughs.

name: ogre
abilities: +4 against Cyborgs for having meat brains and not being shiny.
bad: Oh, you are SO dead.

name: great cthulhu
abilities: Sidekicks flee before Great Cthulhu and cannot help you fight him, or save you from his slobbering grasp. (If you survive, they'll come slinking back.)
bad: Not only are you dead, but everyone who Great Cthulhu did not catch goes up a level, just to mock you.

name: snark
abilities: If ye looks at Snark all squinty-like, it looks like Shark, so he counts as a Shark.
bad: Discard all items ye have in play that start with S.

name: rum bum chugger
abilities: +3 against Merchants.
bad: Accursed! Any player who plays a Curse on ye right now will get the card back, if the Curse actually has some effect on ye.

name: bathtub duckie
abilities: Enhancers played on the Duckie count an extra +5 each... but do not give it any extra Treasure at all.
bad: Ye should know better than to pick up a duckie in a dinghy. Anything could happen! Take the Bad Stuff from the top monster in the Door discards. If there is non ye get away free.

name: seaweed
abilities: As a Wandering Monster, the Seaweed gives +5 to the monsters' side for each Munchkin involved.
bad: Tangled up. Lose yer Footgear.

name: clam
abilities: +5 against anyone with no Class. Ye have +1 to Run Away.
bad: Clam up! Ye may not speak until yer next turn. Ye must communicate by gerstures, written notes, or interpretive dance. Each time ye speak, ye must discard one card.

name: jellyfish
abilities: Enhancers played on the Jellyfish count double! +1 to Run Away.
bad: It stings ye! Lose two levels.

name: viking kittens
abilities: +4 against females. +4 against pirates. So KY00T!
bad: Viking hairballs! Lose a level.

name: sardine
abilities: Not a gourmet item. +5 against French.
bad: If ye fail to Run Away, ye must discard all yer Big items except Ships.

name: scurvy dog
abilities: +4 against Navy.
bad: Ye let him beat ye? Ye should be ashamed. Lose yer Class(es).

name: lousy pink shark
abilities: +2 against French.
bad: This creature is so lame it has no bad effects. Ye escape automatically.

name: dogfish
abilities: The Dogfish is actually a Shark. (Scientific fact!) So he counts as a Shark. If played in the same combat with the Catfish discard both monsters.
bad: Lose the most valuable discard both monsters.

name: captain kid
abilities: He's family No pirate may fight or help to fight, Captain Kid. If ye are a pirate a ye draw him face-up, discard him and either Loot The Room or draw another face-up Door.
bad: Give him a toy. The player to yer left chooses an Item from those ye has in play. Discard it.

name: sea cow
abilities: +3 against Pirates.
bad: Udder disaster! Discard every Item ye have that is worth more than 600 Gold Pieces. If ye have no such items, lose a level.

name: catfish
abilities: +2 against Dutch. If played in the same combat with the Dogfish, discard both monsters.
bad: Disacard and enhancer(s) on yer Ship(s).

name: greenbeard
abilities: +3 against females.
bad: Males lose a level. Females may choose between discarding an item and losing a level.

name: adequate brown shark
abilities: +2 against Spanish.
bad: Exchange yer hand for that of the player who has the fewest cards. In case of ties, ye choose who to trade with. If ye have the fewest or are tied for fewest, there is no effect.

name: lobster mobster
abilities: +3 against Navy. He is a "loan shark", so he counts as a shark.
bad: Ye wanna sleep wit' da fishies? He can arrange it. Reduce yer Level to that of the lowest-Level player.

name: piano tuna
abilities: He loves an audience. He gets +10 if in the same combat with the Privatears.
bad: Sing along until ye lose yer Accent. Discard all Accent cards.

name: almighty cod
abilities: -3 against Merchants.
bad: Discod a card. Err, discard a cod. Blimey! Discard a card.

name: mermaid
abilities: +4 against males.
bad: Males lose their Armor and Footgear, but she lets them keep their hats on. Females just lose a level.

name: perfectly good blue shark
abilities: -4 against French. Sacre bleu!
bad: It takes a perfectly good bite out of ye. Lose a level.

name: privatears
abilities: +5 against British. -2 against Dutch.
bad: If ye has more than one Accent, or more than one Class, ye must discard one Accent or Class.

name: redbeard
abilities: +3 against Merchants. Dirty capitalists.
bad: Ye must give him one Item requiring Hands. If ye has none, lose a level.

name: sea lawyer
abilities: -2 against British. And, of course, he counts as a Shark.
bad: Ye suffer the effects of the top Curse in the discards. If that Curse does not affect ye, lose a level. If there is no Curse in the discards, ye gets away on a technicality and may draw a treasure.

name: puffer fish
abilities: If ye defeat it, then instead of killing it to go up a level, ye can keep it as a Ship Enhancer to fill yer sails with wind. It gives one ship a +2 bonus. Yes, ye gets its Treasures either way.
bad: Blows ye away! Lose yer smallest Ship, or lose a level if ye has no Ship.

name: fine gray shark
abilities: +2 against British. -3 against Navy.
bad: Lose either yer Armor or yer Footgear. Ye get to choose which.

name: howling gail
abilities: -4 against Merchants. -4 against Spanish.
bad: Give two cards to the player on yer right. He must give ye one card in return.

name: sawfish
abilities: +5 against Dutch. -2 against French. Yer Ship(s) do not help ye in this battle.
bad: Lose one Ship, unless yer accent is Dutch. In that case, it saws yer shoes apart. Lose yer Footgear.

name: nobeard
abilities: +3 against males. +3 against Navy.
bad: She likes yer hat. Lose yer Headgear. If ye has no Headgear, lose a level and discard a card.

name: skeleton crew
abilities: +3 against Pirates. -2 against Spanish.
bad: They needs boots, arrr! Lose yer Footgear. If ye has no Footgear, lose a level instead.

name: sir francis drake
abilities: +5 against Spanish. If ye be British, no battle can ensue. Instead, he gives ye a gift... draw a Treasure.
bad: Ye be disarmored. Lose yer Armor. If ye has no Armor, lose a level.

name: blackbeard
abilities: -3 against Pirates. +4 against Merchants. Will not pursue anyone of Level 3 or below.
bad: Ye are plundered! Lose yer Ship and any two other items.

name: boojum
abilities: If the Snark is in the combat, any player may exchange it for this card, turning the Snark into a Boojum.
bad: Ye are softly and silently vanished away. Ye are dead. Should ye encounter a Snark later, ye must Run Away without trying to fight.

name: great white shark
abilities: -4 against Navy. Will not pursue anyone of Level 3 or below.
bad: Lose two levels. But if either the "Wooden Leg" or the "Hook" is in the discards, ye may choose one and take it.

name: prince of whales
abilities: -4 against British or Dutch. Will not pursue anyone of Level 4 or below.
bad: Swallowed! Lose two levels.

name: liopleurodon
abilities: -4 against Pirates. Ships count double against it.
bad: Lose a Ship. If ye have no ship, ye are dead.

name: davy jones
abilities: Will not pursue anyone of Level 5 or below.
bad: Ye are dead, dead, drowndead. But if ye had any of Davy Jones' items when ye went down, each one gives ye an extra level when ye return.

name: bolivar trask
abilities: +2 for each Sentinel in the door discards. You may discard this card to give a Sentinel +5.
bad: Lose an ally or a power.

name: sentinel MK v
abilities: +3 for each ally and power of the player(s) in combat. You may discard this card to give a Sentinel +5.
bad: Lose a level. You have -5 in your next combat.

name: mister sinister
abilities: He knows all your plans. Players may not use one-shots to aid their side in combat.
bad: Go back in time and suffer the bad stuff of the top two monsters in the door discards.

name: onslaught
abilities: When he enters combat, lose an ally or power and he gets its bonus. -5 against the Professor X. Will not pursue anyone level 4 or below.
bad: Lose two levels and discard two cards from your hand.

name: juggernaut
abilities: +10 if he enters combat via a Wandering Monster card. -1 to run away.
bad: Nothing stops the Juggernaut! Lose the armor you are wearing and a level.

name: omega red
abilities: +4 against anyone who is not wearing the color red. -1 to run away.
bad: Lose the card giving you the biggest bonus

name: sentinel MK III
abilities: +2 for each ally and power of the player(s) in combat. You may discard this card to give a Sentinel +5.
bad: Lose a level and discard a card.

name: emma frost
abilities: -3 against X-Men. +3 against females. +6 against anyone wearing a diamond or the color white.
bad: Reveal your hand. The player to your left chooses two cards for you to discard.

name: the brood
abilities: Hive Mind! Each player may discard one card to give the brood +3
bad: Swarmed! Roll the die and discard that many cards.

name: mystique
abilities: No one may help you fight her. +3 against males. -2 against females.
bad: No one believes it is really you. You cannot offer to help or ask for help in combat until you go up a level.

name: nimrod
abilities: +2 for each ally and power in play. Counts as a Sentinel. You may discard this card to give a sentinel +5.
bad: Lose an ally, a power, and a level.

name: blob
abilities: +3 if there is any candy or soda on the table when he enters combat. +6 if both.
bad: He sits on you. The next time you attempt to run away, you automatically fail.

name: bastion
abilities: +10 if Masters Mold or Nimrod is in the Door discards. Counts as a Sentinel. You may discard this card to give a sentinel +5
bad: Lose a level, plus an additional level for each Sentinel in the Door discards.

name: william stryker
abilities: +5 against players with no affiliation.
bad: Captured for government experiments. You have -5 in your next combat for each of your powers.

name: pyro
abilities: +6 if there is an open flame in the room or a lighter on the table.
bad: Too hot to handle! Discard three cards from your hand.

name: lady deathstrike
abilities: +4 against males or players not wearing armor. -3 against Wolverine.
bad: You are dead.

name: sebastian shaw
abilities: +3 against X-Men. +1 for each card the player(s) in combat have in hand and in play when he enters combat.
bad: Roll the die and discard that many cards

name: phalanx
abilities: +3 for each electronic device on the table when they enter combat.
bad: Lose all your allies to the Techno-Virus. If you have none, lose a level.

name: mojo
abilities: +5 if there is a television in the room. An extra +5 if it is on.
bad: Enslaved by the spineless ones. Lose your Affiliation. If you have none, lose a level.

name: toad
abilities: When he enters combat, roll the die. On a 1-3, he gets +3. On a 4-6, the player(s) in combat must discard a card.
bad: Toxic Spit! Discard a random card from your hand

name: stryfe
abilities: +5 against X-Factor. -3 against X-Force.
bad: Lose your Affiliation and discard items worth at least 500 gold pieces.

name: black tom cassidy
abilities: +6 if there is a living plant in the room.
bad: Lose your Headgear. If you aren't wearing any, discard two cards from your hand.

name: master mold
abilities: +4 against anyone with an affiliation. Counts as a Sentinel. You may discard this card to give a Sentinel +10.
bad: Lose three levels.

name: graydon creed
abilities: Mystique and Sabertooth may join him in combat without the use of a wandering monster card.
bad: Lose a card giving you the smallest bonus.

name: sauron
abilities: When he enters combat, the player(s) in combat must discard an ally.
bad: Energy Vampire! Lose a vampire.

name: silver samurai
abilities: +5 against anyone wearing armor. -2 against anyone with both hands equipped
bad: Lose your armor. If you aren't wearing any, lose a level.

name: magneto
abilities: +4 for each player in combat with at least 500 gold pieces worth of items in play.
bad: Lose all items worth 300 gold pieces or more.

name: sabretooth
abilities: Combat bonuses played on him are worth an extra +2
bad: He rips you to shreds! You are dead!

name: sentinel MK I
abilities: +1 for each ally and power of the player(s) in combat. You may discard this card to give a Sentinel +5.
bad: Lose a level.

name: fox spirit
abilities: If you have Fox Kung Fu you have +4 to defeat this spirit
bad: Go through the discards until you find a Trap that can take a card or level from you. You get no defense. If you find no Trap that can affect you, you may sneer at the fox spirit and go on

name: hong kong kong
abilities: Will not pursue anyone of Level 4 or below
bad: Males are dead. Females are dressed in a nightie and taken to the top of the tallest building in chinatown...lose all items you possess, and a level

name: rokurokubi
abilities: Evil, hungry flying heads your Level does not count against them!
bad: Nibble nibble nibble... Lose four levels. If that would reduce you below Level 1, you are dead and restart at Level 1!

name: no wei
abilities: The surfer demon! Your Items do not help you against him; fight him with your level and your styles.
bad: You are very confused. Discard your hand and draw one Treasue card and one Door card, face up

name: mecha-ninja
abilities: The 50-ton master of stealth! -4 against Samurai. Will not pursue anyone of Level 4 or below, except Ninja.
bad: It steps on you. You die

name: hong kong cong
abilities: +4 against Samurai
bad: They steal your weapons. Lose all items that require Hands.

name: The Dragon Lady
abilities: The beautiful mastermind whom the other monsters serve. Will not pursue anyone of Level 5 or below.
bad: Females are dead. Males lose four levels, and must Run Away if they ever meet her again. They cannot even play cards against her.

name: girl wrestler
abilities: Females may choose not to fight the Girl Wrestler. If they don't fight, she gives them two Door cards.
bad: Headlock! Ankle twist! Catastrophic Piledriver of Harsh Fate! Lose two levels

name: level gaki
abilities: Anyone may play any card to help a Gaki. Any card that does not normally help monsters is worth +2 to a Gaki.
bad: Roll the die and lose that many levels.

name: geisha gorgon
abilities: Sultry, exotic, dangerous, and ugly as sin! -3 against Monks
bad: Turns you to stone. You may give up a level and recover immediately, or miss your next turn and recover that way. If you miss your next turn, you can't do anything between now and the end of the turn you chose to miss.

name: go hang
abilities: He has bad noose for you... especially for Ninjas. +3 against Ninjas.
bad: Hanging out with him is bad for your reputation.

name: tiger ghost
abilities: -2 against Monks.
bad: Show your hand. Your rivals vote on which card you must give to the lowest Level player (or discard, if you are lowest

name: moo goo pan guy
abilities: His only weapon is a huge dish of ground meat, but his style is strong!
bad: Show your hand. Discard all cards, both in play and in your hand, with Powder, Oil, or Potion in the name. He keeps them to cook with...

name: jogira
abilities: A huge, fire-breathing lizard who runs through Tokyo. Fire and flame weapons do not harm him. Will not pursue anyone of Level 4 or below.
bad: You vanish in a puff of flame. Regret to inform, you are dead.

name: skills gaki
abilities: It lives off the knowledge it takes from the minds of its victims... Anyone may play any card to help a Gaki. Any card that does not normally help monsters is worth +2 to a Gaki.
bad: Lose one Class. If you have no Class, lose a style; if you have no style, lose a level

name: king cobra
abilities: A Monk can choose to walk peacefully past the King Cobra without combat
bad: Lose two levels

name: han so low
abilities: The smuggler demon! Instead of fighting, you can trade any two cards from the same deck, from your hand or in play, for a face down card from that deck.You can trade more than one pair.
bad: Each player whose Level is lower than yours, starting on your left, may either draw a card from your hand or take one item you have in play!

name: harmless-looking schoolgirl
abilities: +3 against Monks. Don't let the uniform fool you!
bad: Happy Fun Power Activate! Form of Giant Ass-Kicking Demon Woman! Lose your Armor and a level. If you have no Armor, lose three levels.

name: hopping vampire
abilities: -3 against Yakuza. Will not pursue anyone of Level 3 or below, except Samurai
bad: Lose three levels

name: hi ho
abilities: An evel dwarf. He attacks by kicking you in the shins! Do not count any bonuses from Armor or Headgear.
bad: He grabs your shoes and runs. Lose your Footgear

name: soh soo mee
abilities: The lawyer demon! -4 aginst Yakuza (professional courtesy)
bad: He gets 90% of your assets. Pick one Item in play to keep; discard the rest. Pick one card from your hand; discard the rest.

name: karate squid
abilities: Wax on, wax on, wax on, wax on. Wax off, wax off, wax off, wax off...
bad: It disarms you. Lose all Items that require Hands

name: wen yen
abilities: If you like, you may gamble with him instead of fighting. Roll the die. If you roll a 1, you must discard one card! Otherwise subtract 2 from the roll and draw that many cards from either or both decks, face up.
bad: Discard your whole hand

name: tu phat
abilities: The demon of obesity! +4 against Samurai!
bad: He sits on your head. Lose your Headgear, or lose a level if you have no Headgear

name: fang yu
abilities: The snake demon! -1 to Run Away.
bad: He bits your shadow and poisons your soul. You must either make up a short poem about how much this bothers you, or let each player, in the order you choose, draw a card from your hand (until you run out).

name: kung fu aliens
abilities: You have +3 against them if you have no Style, as they try to analyze the strange Earth combat art you are using.
bad: Male munchkins lose two levels. Femal munchkins are abducted. They cannot help anyone, or interfer in combats, until their next turn is over.

name: long tung
abilities: The drooling demon! -2 against Ninjas, who don't mind a little drool.
bad: You know when you're licked. Lose all your Styles.

name: style gaki
abilities: It eats your combat skills! Style bonuses are useless against this Gaki. Anyone may play any card to help a Gaki. Any card that does not normally help monsters is worth +2 to a Gaki.
bad: Lose all your Styles

name: weapon gaki
abilities: Eats weapons! Discard one weapon (any item that requires Hands, your choice) before combat! Anyone may play any card to help a Gaki. Any card that does not normally help monsters is worth +2 to a Gaki.
bad: Discard another item that requires Hands. The person to your left chooses which one.

name: street beggar
abilities: He might be a dangerous foe in disguise. Better whack him just to be sure
bad: Drop a card as you flee in humiliating defeat. The person to your right chooses the discard randomly from your hand.

name: ugly little idol
abilities: Attacks with waves of eeeeeevil. +4 against Monks.
bad: Discard a Style

name: evil ninjas
abilities: +4 aginst Ninjas. They know all your tricks!
bad: Lose two levels and any Ninja-only items you have in play

name: ah chu
abilities: He attacks with ninja sneezing powder! Ninjas are prepared, so he's at -4 against them.
bad: Sneeze your hat off. Lose your Headgear and a level

name: origami dragon
abilities: All fire or flame attacks count double against the Origami Dragon. You are at -1 to Run Away if you can't defeat him.
bad: Ow, paper cuts! Discard all Items in play that you can't use (for example, because you have too few Hands or you are the wrong Class).

name: yee ha
abilities: The cowboy demon! What is a cowboy demon doinng in this movie? +4 aginst Yakuza... he's quick on the draw.
bad: He ropes and hogties you and takes your hat and boots. "Funny hat and boots this honorable varmint has." Lose your Headgear and Footgear

name: big eyes, small mouse
abilities: Too cute to live. Your duty is clear!
bad: It runs up your leg! Lose your Armor

name: hong kong tong
abilities: Low-class thugs. Lower even than the Yakuza, and they're jealous. +4 against Yakuza.
bad: Yakuza must give up thier Class in disgrace. Others lose a level.

name: cy-bugs
abilities: +5 against those motivated by Inspiration.
bad: Covered in slime. Lose your Armor

name: kakamora
abilities: There are aldways more Kakamora. When defeated, shuffle this card back into the Door deck instead of putting it into the discards.
bad: They knock you out and take your things. Lose and item.

name: anastasia
abilities: Anastasia can join Drizella in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Those shoes certainly look better on her. Lose the Footgear you are wearing.

name: drizella
abilities: Drizella can join Anastasia in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: She is trying to sing again! Drop what you have in your hands and cover your ears! Lose all Hand Items.

name: card guards
abilities: -1 to Run Away
bad: They deck you

name: jetsam
abilities: Discard your Motivations(s). Jetsam can join Flotsam in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Give one of your cards in play to each player.

name: flotsam
abilities: Discard your Class(es). Flotsam can join Jetsam in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Give a card from your hand to each player.

name: the hyenas
abilities: +2 against Companions.
bad: Hippity-hop all the way to the birdie boiler. Lose a level.

name: panic
abilities: Panic cain join Pain in combat without a Wandering Monster card. +3 if Pain is involved in the combat.
bad: Makes you mortal. Discard your class(es).

name: pain
abilities: Pain can join Panic in combat without a Wandering Monster card. +3 if Panic in involved in the combat.
bad: He thinks your shoes look kind of dashing. Lose the Footgear that you're wearing.

name: the sheriff of nottingham
abilities: He comes around to collect taxes and everyone clears out. Discard your allies.
bad: Threatens to haul you off to jail. Lose one level.

name: mother gothel
abilities: Mother knows best. Princesses that attempt to Run Away automatically fail.
bad: Couldn't hear you over the sound of complete and utter betrayal. Lose your Headgear.

name: mr. smee
abilities: If Hook is present in the combat, Mr. Smee will run off, leaving behind his Treasure.
bad: Sorry to be an inconvenience. Lose two items of your choice.

name: iago
abilities: Won't fight Companions. Professional courtesy. A Companion encountering Iago must discard this card and must Kick Down the Door again.
bad: Molts all over you. Lose the Armor that you're wearing.

name: duke of weselton
abilities: +5 against those motivated by Love. He wouldn't know love if it bit him.
bad: Now he's badgering you! Lose your Motivation(s).

name: cruella de vil
abilities: Fashion is her weapon. All the armor you are wearing counts for her this combat, not for you.
bad: Runs you off the road! Lose two levels

name: hans
abilities: +5 against Princesses, he knows their weakness.
bad: He just wants your kingdom. Discard all your items.

name: lady tremaine
abilities: -5 against Fairy Godmothers. They don't have to do as she says.
bad: You can't go to the ball! Lose your Footgear

name: peg leg pete
abilities: +5 if you have an Ally. He knows all their tricks.
bad: Throws you off the boat. Lose two items

name: king candy
abilities: +5 against Heroes.
bad: Game over! Lose your Class(es).

name: jumba
abilities: +5 against Fairy Godmothers. He's a man of science and doesn't believe in magic.
bad: You become Experiment 262, and are programmed to steal everyone's right show. Lose two levels.

name: gaston
abilities: If Gaston becomes Barge-Sized, he gets not the normal +5, but +15 instead. He's an intimidating specimen.
bad: Your Headgear reminds him of antlers; he wants it for his mantle. If you have Headgear, it's his now! Lose your Headgear.

name: captain hook
abilities: -5 against those motivated by Adventure.
bad: Walk The Plank! You are dead, unless you bribe him with 500 Gold Pieces of Treasure. He is a pirate, after all.

name: shere khan
abilities: You can't get help in this combat, including from your Allies.
bad: Mauled by a very angry tiger. Lose two levels.

name: the evil queen
abilities: She isn't the fairest in the land, in any way. Your Level does not count in this fight.
bad: Poisons you with an apple. Lose your Class(es).

name: yzma
abilities: -5 against those motivated by Inspiration.
bad: Pull the lever! You are at -5 on your next combat

name: captain gantu
abilities: -5 against those motivated by Family.
bad: He hauls you off to interplanetary jail. Lose three levels.

name: queen of hearts
abilities: +5 against those motivated by Adventure.
bad: Off with your head! Lose your Headgear

name: callaghan
abilities: -5 against those motivated by Love.
bad: You don't have enough microbots to build up your armor. Discard the Armor you are wearing. If you aren't wearing any, lose a level.

name: dr. facilier
abilities: Dr. Facilier looks for your fate in the cards. Flip over the top card of the Door deck. If it's a monster, it joins combat. Otherwise, discard it.
bad: Transformation Central. Lose your Class(es) and your Motivations.

name: scar
abilities: +5 against those motivated by Family.
bad: Looks like you weren't prepared. You are dead.

name: ursula
abilities: Will not pursue Level 3 or below. Discard your Footgear immediately.
bad: Takes your voice. You can't speak until the beginning of your next turn.

name: tomatoa
abilities: Will not pursue Level 3 or below.
bad: He takes your gold to add to his shell. Lose 1,000 Gold Pieces worth of Items.

name: jafar
abilities: Will not pursue Level 3 or below. Higher-Leveled characters lose a level, even if they escape.
bad: Reduces you to a street rat. Discard all Items worth more than 200 Gold Pieces.

name: monstro
abilities: Will not pursue Level 4 or below.
bad: Swallowed whole. You are dead.

name: maleficent
abilities: Will not pursue Level 4 or below. +5 against Princesses. She knows how to needle them.
bad: Cursed! Go through the discard pile and suffer the effects of the first two Curses you find. If you don't find any, lucky you. This Bad Stuff cannot be countered with a Wishing Star.

name: hades
abilities: Will not pursue Level 5 or below. -5 against Heroes. They make him SO MAD.
bad: Bada bing, bada BOOM. You are dead.

name: mook
abilities: +4 if you are in Technical Stance.
bad: Discard a card from your hand

name: purple dragon
abilities: Look at the top Door card. If it is a monster Level 6 or lower, add it to the combat. If not, discard the revealed Door card.
bad: Lose a level.

name: mouser
abilities: You cannot Run Away from Mousers. Any monsters with "Mouser" or "Flyborg" in their title may join this combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Lose your Footgear

name: mugger
abilities: +5 against anyone with at least 1,000 Gold Pieces worth of items in play.
bad: Discard at least 500 Gold Pieces worth of Items.

name: savate
abilities: +2 for each player in combat with a Two-Hand Item.
bad: Lose your Hand Items.

name: stone soldier
abilities: Players in combat with Stone Soldier do not get any bonuses from Hand Items
bad: -5 to your next combat.

name: victor
abilities: Each player in combat with Victor must discard a random card from their hand.
bad: Lose all Hand Items

name: foot soldier
abilities: May join any combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Lose a level.

name: flyborg
abilities: You get -2 to Run Away.
bad: Lose your Headgear.

name: mouser squad
abilities: +3 against any players with no Footgear. You get -1 to Run Away.
bad: Lose your Footgear or a level.

name: darkwater soldiers
abilities: +2 for each Ally in play.
bad: Lose your Allies.

name: foot squad
abilities: Reveal the top 5 Door cards. If there are any monsters or Traps with "Foot" in their title, play them now. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the deck.
bad: Lose 2 levels

name: dragon gang
abilities: Roll the die. If you roll a 1-3, discard an equipped Item.
bad: Roll the die and lose as many Items as the number rolled.

name: granitor
abilities: +5 against players Level 5 or higher. Ignore all Hand Items in this combat.
bad: Lose a level if you are Level 4 or lower.

name: street phantoms
abilities: You cannot Run Away from this monster unless you are wearing a Phase Cloak.
bad: The next time you try to Run Away, you automatically fail.

name: foot assassin
abilities: -3 if you are in Defensive Stance.
bad: You are dead.

name: captain tragg
abilities: You may not team-up against this monster.
bad: Lose your Hand Items. All other players must discard Items equal to or greater than the Gold Piece value of your lost items.

name: flyborg swarm
abilities: Any combat bonuses played on this monster are doubled. -3 against Items with "stun" in the title.
bad: Lose your Hand Items.

name: jammer
abilities: Other players may add Street Phantoms to this combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Lose your Stance.

name: hun jones
abilities: +4 if Casey Jones is not in this combat.
bad: Roll the die and lose half that many levels, rounded up.

name: maze
abilities: You may not use Katas in this combat.
bad: Lose all your Katas.

name: elite foot
abilities: +6 unless a player plays a Trap on you right now.
bad: Discard a Trap from your hand or lose a level.

name: darius dun
abilities: Search the discard pile for Street Phantoms and add it to the combat. If it is not in the discard pile, Darius has -2 this combat.
bad: Lose your Armor and Headgear.

name: old hob
abilities: +4 against Mutants. +2 against players who have both Hands equipped with Items.
bad: If you are wearing Armor, you have -5 in your next combat. If not, it's -10.

name: agent bishop
abilities: Add double your Ally's bonus to Bishop's level then discard your Ally.
bad: Lose your best item.

name: rocksteady
abilities: When this monster is revealed, search through the Door deck and discard pile to find Bebop. Add him to this combat and then shuffle the Door deck.
bad: Lose an Item. Reshuffle Rocksteady into the Door deck.

name: baxter stockman
abilities: +2 for every smartphone or tablet in the room.
bad: Lose your next turn. At least your have a smartphone to keep you entertained until then!

name: bebop
abilities: When this monster is revealed, search through the Door deck and discard pile to find Rocksteady. Add him to this combat and then shuffle the Door deck.
bad: Lose a level and reshuffle Bebop into the Door deck.

name: brainwashed leo
abilities: If Leonardo is in the game, add his Level and Hand Item bonuses to this monster. Leo may not take part in this combat, even if this card joined as a Wandering Monster. If Leonardo draws this card on his turn, he must try to Run Away.
bad: Leonardo's player steals a random card from your hand. If there's no Leonardo player, discard a card.

name: bludgeon
abilities: +3 against any player with an Ally. May join Koya in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Lose your Headgear or Armor.

name: Karai
abilities: +4 unless a player in the combat has Shredder's Helmet or Shredder's Claw equipped, in which case she is automatically defeated.
bad: You die. And lose a level.

name: koya
abilities: +3 against any player with no Ally. May join Bludgeion in combat without a Wandering Monster card.
bad: Your level becomes equal to the lowest-Level player's.

name: rat king
abilities: Look at the top Door card: If it is a monster Level 12 or under, it joins the combat.
bad: Lose a Kata and your Stance.

name: alopex
abilities: You get -1 to Run Away. If Alopex is in play as an Ally, discard it and give this monster +5.
bad: All players must lose their Allies.

name: kitsune
abilities: Roll the die. If you roll a 1-3, you are brainwashed-you automatically lose this combat and must add your Level to the Level of the next monster revealed (by any player).
bad: You get -5 in your next combat.

name: hakk-R
abilities: Once you have the required power to defeat this monster, roll the die. If you roll a 1-3, collect Treasure and go up levels, then reshuffle Hakk-R back into the Door deck
bad: Discard 4 cards from your hand.

name: leatherhead
abilities: Draw and discard the top two cards of the Door deck when Leatherhead enters combat. He gets +4 for each monster revealed this way.
bad: Look at the Door discards and suffer the Bad Stuff from the top 2 Monster cards.

name: slash
abilities: Players may not use One-Shots to aid either side in this combat.
bad: Lose all Katas, Allies, and Stances.

name: krang
abilities: +4 against Aggressive Stance. -4 against Technical Stance. Will not pursue anyone Level 4 or below (they can Run Away automatically).
bad: Lose 2 levels and all Allies.

name: technodrome
abilities: If Honeycutt is your Ally, you may discard him to instantly defeat the Technodrome. Will not pursue anyone Level 4 or below ( they can Run Away automatically).
bad: You die and lose your Armor, Headgear, and Footgear.

name: shredder
abilities: When Shredder enters combat, all players must discard their Allies. One-Shots may not be played to aid players. Will not pursue anyone Level 5 or below ( they can Run Away automatically).
bad: Discard all the cards in your hand. Lose a level for each card discarded this way.
